_header: Hail comely creature courteous of kind
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Salve Regina — eight quatrains, followed by concluding rubric couplet

Bod423.First Lines:
HEyl comely creature curteys of kyndeChaast quene of konnyng of
                    comfort & counsail…
Bod423.Last Lines:
…After þe birthe verrely clene maiden þu weregoddys
                    moder mary haue mynde on our preiere
Bod423.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 457.
